title: Doumo, Suki na Hito ni Horegusuri wo Irai sareta Majo desu. (Manga)
other_names: Doumo, Suki na hito ni Horegusuri wo Iraisareta Majo desu., Hello, I Am a Witch and My Crush Wants Me to Make a Love Potion!, Hello, I Am the Witch That Was Requested by My Crush to Make a Love Potion, I Am a Witch Requested by My Crush to Make Love Potion, I, a Witch, Am Requested by My Crush to Make Him a Love Potion, どうも、好きな人に惚れ薬を依頼された魔女です。
